name: Coloris: color matching puzzle
description:
Drag and Drop multi-color blocks on the and match 3 or more of the same color to clear the board. The more you score the more colors unlock to make the game even more challenging.

Match the blocks Vertically or Horizontally and make Combos if you can to get bonus points.

Invite your friends to beat your high score and if you like the game please rate the game in App Store and if you have any feedback to improve the game don't hesitate to contact me through the support link.

Thank you for playing Coloris!
